meanings.definition: To make more attractive or stylish.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys gussying up her room with colorful pillows.
meanings.sent2: The actress was gussying herself for the red carpet event.
meanings.sent3: He couldn't resist gussying his pet turtle with a tiny bow tie.
meanings.sent4: The garden gnomes were gussying up the yard with their bright hats.
meanings.sent5: The chef was gussying the dessert with edible flowers for a fancy touch.

meanings.definition: To dress up or adorn in a showy manner.
meanings.sent1: The children were gussying themselves in costumes for the school play.
meanings.sent2: She was gussying her hair with glitter for the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat surprised everyone by gussying itself with a tiny top hat.
meanings.sent4: The city was gussying up for the big parade with colorful banners.
meanings.sent5: The magician was gussying his performance with flashy lights and music.
